document_data.caption: A map showing Maloren Sods in eastern Snowdown.
document_data.name: Maloren Sods
document_data.mainbody: '''Maloren Sods''' was a swamp located on the island of [[Snowdown]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Maloren Sods was found on the eastern side of the island separating the coastal town of [[Brannoch]] from the rest of the island. The swamp also prevented a branch of the [[Snowdown Ride]] from reaching Brannoch, making it the only settlement on Snowdown not connected to the road. Maloren Sods covered approximately {{SI|150|sq mi|k}} of the island.
